trans-unit.source: Defines an attribute that is used by ASP.NET server controls to indicate at design time whether nested content that is contained within a server control corresponds to controls or to properties of the server control.
trans-unit.target: 定義 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項使用的屬性 (Attribute)，指出設計階段時伺服器控制項中包含的巢狀內容對應至控制項，或是伺服器控制項的屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> is used in combination with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> to determine how nested content of a control is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>用來結合<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>解譯來判斷如何巢狀的控制項的內容。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> is `true` and <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> is `false`, the nested content contained within an ASP.NET server control is persisted as controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>是`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>是`false`，ASP.NET 伺服器控制項所包含的巢狀的內容便會保存為控制項。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> is `false` and <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> is `true`, the nested content is persisted as properties of the server control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>是`false`和<xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute>是`true`，巢狀的內容便會保存為伺服器控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The code example in this section contains two parts.
trans-unit.target: 在本節中的程式碼範例包含兩個部分。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to set the metadata of a custom control so that at design time, its nested content is persisted as properties of the control.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何設定自訂控制項的中繼資料，以便在設計階段，其巢狀的內容會保存為控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to use classes in an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁中的類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to apply the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> attribute so that none of a custom server control's nested controls are persisted as nested controls.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何套用<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>屬性，讓一個自訂的伺服器控制項的巢狀控制項會保存為巢狀控制項。

trans-unit.source: The custom server control named `CollectionPropertyControl` has the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> attribute set to `false` so that the `Employee` objects that are added are persisted as nested elements.
trans-unit.target: 自訂的伺服器控制項，名為`CollectionPropertyControl`具有<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>屬性設為`false`以便`Employee`加入的物件會保存為巢狀項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes in an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`ASP.NET 網頁中的類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to persist the nested content as nested controls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將巢狀內容保存為巢狀控制項，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" /> class using a Boolean value indicating whether to persist nested content as nested controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用布林值指出是否將巢狀內容保存為巢狀控制項，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to apply the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> attribute for a custom server control named `CollectionPropertyControl`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何套用<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>屬性自訂伺服器控制項，名為`CollectionPropertyControl`。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>類別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to persist nested content as nested controls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將巢狀內容保存為巢狀控制項，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use customized persistence; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示使用自訂持續性 (Persistence)，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" /> class using two Boolean values.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個布林值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: One indicating whether to persist nested content as nested controls and the other indicating whether to use a custom persistence method.
trans-unit.target: 一個指出是否將巢狀內容保存為巢狀控制項，另一個指出是否使用自訂持續性方法。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the default attribute state.
trans-unit.target: 指示預設的屬性狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.Default" /> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.Default" /> 欄位是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.Default> field is `Yes`, indicating that nested content is persisted at design time.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.Default>欄位是`Yes`，表示巢狀的內容在設計階段保存。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否等於目前的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is equal to the current object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 等於目前物件則為 <paramref name="obj" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 做為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" /> 類別的雜湊函式。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" /> 的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the value of the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" /> class is the default value of the derived clss.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" /> 類別 (Class) 之目前執行個體的值是否為衍生類別的預設值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value of the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" /> is the default instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" /> 目前執行個體的值是預設執行個體，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A> method to determine if the current instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> class is the same as the default instance.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>方法來判斷目前的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>類別是預設執行個體相同。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>類別。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that nested content should not persist as nested controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 表示設計階段時巢狀內容不應保存為巢狀控制項。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.No> field is called, the inner content of a server control is persisted as properties, not as server.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.No>欄位稱為、 伺服器控制項的內部內容會保存為屬性，非伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the nested content is persisted as nested controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出設計階段時巢狀內容是否保存為巢狀控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to persist nested content as nested controls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將巢狀內容保存為巢狀控制項，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to get the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.Persist%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.Persist%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the server control provides custom persistence of nested controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出設計階段時伺服器控制項是否提供巢狀控制項的自訂持續性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to provide custom persistence of nested content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示提供巢狀內容的自訂持續性，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To configure nested content for custom persistence, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> overload that takes a `usesCustomPersistence` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的自訂持續性的巢狀的內容，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>採用多載`usesCustomPersistence`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to get the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.UsesCustomPersistence%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.UsesCustomPersistence%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>類別。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that nested content should persist as controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 表示設計階段時巢狀內容應保存為控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.Yes" /> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.Yes" /> 欄位是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.Yes> field is called, nested content is persisted as controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute.Yes>欄位稱為，巢狀的內容持續為控制項。
